TopicTitle: Plants vs Zombies 2: It's About Time

Articles.Content:
Not sure if there is a thread about this. I couldn't find it by searching. If there is one, please merge it with this.

http://www.popcap.com/plants-vs-zombies-2

I've first heard this a while ago (around 2011-2012), but didn't get to play it until when the first Zombot is introduced, and didn't play often until a few days ago. But it's really fun to play, with all the new plants and that (some plants did return, but regardless). By now I've played all the levels available and am starting on the endless zones of all the worlds (Ancient Egypt, Pirate Sea, Wild West, Far Future). I'm looking forward on the new Zombot for Far Future and the new world (some speculated to be called Dark Ages) which may be a lot more fun than before.

EDIT: Added a link after the photo links from Google gone HAL . http://imgur.com/a/yYcmX#0

Edited May 1, 2014 by Designer225

Yup, nobody really cares about the little mobile game Plants vs zombies 2

Probably people saw, they said "don't care" and left.
It follows EVIL, sorry, EA, tradition of break the game and add as many p2w currencies as possible!
